    P

    pickCard(Card, Player) - Method in class player.Player
    Picks a card from another player's offer and adds it to this player's jest pile.
    player - package player
     
    Player - Class in player
    Represents an abstract player in the Jest card game.
    Player(String) - Constructor for class player.Player
    Constructs a new Player with the specified name.
    PlayerState - Class in model.game
    Represents a serializable snapshot of a player's state at a specific moment in the game.
    PlayerState(Player) - Constructor for class model.game.PlayerState
    Constructs a PlayerState snapshot from a Player object.
    playGame() - Method in class model.game.Game
    Starts and executes the complete game from beginning to end.
    playGame(boolean) - Method in class model.game.Game
    Starts or resumes a complete game from beginning to end.
    playRound() - Method in class model.game.Game
    Executes a complete game round.
    playTurn(Game) - Method in class player.Player
    Executes the player's turn in the game.
